home.title: Boost your productivity with technology
home.subtitle: Boost your productivity with technology and sustainability
home.description: AgroTech is an innovative portal for agricultural producers to improve their productivity using advanced technology and sustainable practices.
home.feature1Desc: Access to experts in sustainable agriculture to optimize your production.
home.feature2Desc: Track your crops in real-time with cutting-edge technology.
home.feature3Desc: Tools to manage properties, producers and crops efficiently.
home.feature4Desc: Implement agroecological techniques that increase productivity and preserve the environment.
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your rural property
services.consultingDesc: Expert advice for implementing sustainable agriculture techniques on your property.
services.orgFarmingDesc: Planning and implementation of organic and agroecological garden systems.
services.diagnosisDesc: Complete analysis of your property's sustainability with personalized recommendations.
services.managementDesc: Tools and consultancies to optimize the management of rural resources and operations.
about.title: About AgroTech
about.subtitle: Innovation in Sustainable Agriculture
about.description: AgroTech is a platform dedicated to revolutionizing agriculture through technology and sustainability, aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.
about.missionText: Empower agricultural producers with advanced technology and knowledge in sustainable practices to increase productivity while preserving the environment.
about.visionText: Be the leading agricultural technology platform in Brazil, promoting sustainable and profitable agriculture.
about.ods2: SDG 2 - Zero Hunger and Sustainable Agriculture
about.ods2Desc: AgroTech is committed to the United Nations SDG 2, which aims to eradicate hunger, achieve food security and improve nutrition through sustainable and productive agriculture. We promote practices that increase agricultural productivity while protecting ecosystems.
about.ods2Goal1: Eradicate hunger and ensure food security
about.ods2Goal2: Double the agricultural productivity of small producers
about.ods2Goal4: Promote conservation of land and genetic resources

home.testimonialSubtitle: Meet success stories from producers who transformed their operations with AgroTech
home.testimonial1Text: With AgroTech, I was able to increase my production by 40% while reducing input costs. The consulting on sustainable practices was key to success.
home.testimonial2Text: The real-time monitoring system helped me identify crop problems in advance. Excellent tool for efficient management.
home.testimonial3Text: I implemented the agroecological practices recommended by AgroTech and significantly improved soil quality. I recommend it to all producers.
home.testimonial4Text: The platform completely simplified my property management. Now I can focus on what really matters: quality production.
home.cta.title: Ready to transform your property?
home.cta.description: Join thousands of producers who are already using AgroTech to increase productivity, reduce costs and implement sustainable practices. Create your account now and start your success journey!
